column2: "Why am I here? Haha, it's not like I heard something from a certain someone, y'know."
"It's just that I had a gut feeling that she might be coming."
"If you're here, partner, then it looks like my hunch was spot-on."
"If we defend this place, we should be able to meet her, yeah?"
"...And if you do indeed meet that [Apprentice], what do you intend to do?"
"You, you're the one that was always with that scary guy..."
"...Please refer to me as Sina. In any case, your answer, please."
"When you do meet [Apprentice], what will you do?"
"That... I'm really not sure. I'm not sure... but I feel that if I don't meet her, something bad will happen."
"Meet her, see her with my eyes, hit her with some words... I just need to talk to her."
"Then, please allow me to accompany you. I would like to ascertain the results."
"He's like a mirror image of my past self. ...I can't just let him be."
"4章\u3000歴史を騙し、現在を喰らう"
